title: We Do Yoga
description: Yoga is a great form of exercise that can be lots of fun! In We Do Yoga, a boy and girl demonstrate several different yoga poses while associating them with animals and objects. Entertaining and colorful illustrations and engaging text support emergent readers. Students will also have the opportunity to identify the author's purpose as well as connect to prior knowledge.
meta: arch, balance, cobra, pose, reach, yoga
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /b/ sound
Alphabetical Order : Arrange words in alphabetical order

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
